items.sentence: Tom and Mary have chickens in their backyard.
Didn\'t you know Tom was in Boston last week?
Didn\'t you know Tom was in Boston last year?
Didn\'t you know Tom was living in Australia?
Didn\'t you know Tom was seeing someone else?
Didn\'t you know Tom would be here this week?
I\'m never going to be able to do that again.
I\'m not used to people not agreeing with me.
If Tom breaks up with Mary, he\'ll regret it.
If you eat a lot, you\'ll eventually get fat.
You seem to have something else on your mind.
You should ask Tom to teach you how to drive.
You should do everything Tom tells you to do.
You should get Tom to teach you how to drive.
You should let Tom know that Mary will drive.
It\'s been a long time since I\'ve done that.
Tom and I ran into each other at the airport.
Tom and I used to have a lot of fun together.
Don\'t believe everything you hear about Tom.
I wonder whether Tom needs to do that or not.
